Directions: In a skillet, cook sausage and apples until sausage is heated through and apples are tender. Add syrup; heat though. In a microwave, warm pitas on high for 20 seconds. Fill with the sausage mixture.
Ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package brown and serve sausage links, sliced
4 medium tart apples, peeled and thinly sliced
